oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mapping of radiation field from a discharge laser head
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BHATIA, MS
MADAN, VK
DONGARE, AS
PHULLUKE, RAJESHREE
GIRISH KUMAR
AGARWAL, VIVEK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: discharges (electric)
electromagnetic compatibility
electromagnetic interference
probes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: EMI radiation from the laser head of a copper-vapour laser (pulsed discharge laser) are mapped in the near field with a characterized pick- up probe. This is followed by simulation of the laser head as a microstrip antenna and also as a loop antenna. The modification of radiation characteristics of these antennas by the inclusion of a metallic sheet with many shorts is studied with the aim to minimize radiated EMI. Shielding of the laser head feed cable is also simulated.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the International Conference on Electromagnetic Interference and Compatibility, Bangalore, India, 21-23 February 2002, 6-10
